name: Real Street KungFu Fighting
description:
You are a Kung Fu fighter, and desperately want to leave your gang, but your gang has other ideas. You need to fight for your girlfriend and your life, which could end very soon if you make the wrong move. Dare to survive from kung fu fighter in best fighting game you are looking for!

Features:
Most amazing fighting arcade game style
Eye-catching visuals
Very easy and smooth sliding and touching screen control
Learn you to perfect martial arts and kung Fu karate
Very easy and addictive free game
Realistic fighting sound effects
Smooth fighters animations and fighting styles
